page.title: 04Home Life
page.content: {Preparing for school-}I get up at around 7.30am,my duvet half way down my bed.I discover that it is Thursday, the time is 7.40am. Eventually I am forced to get dressed and I rush downstairs.I switch on the T.V only to see Anne Diamond and Nick on T.V AM. Down comes my Mum from upstairs. I pour out my cereal and eat it up quickly.I brush my teeth and get into the car. We get to school and,my Mum drops me off outside the school gates. When I got home it was about 4.02pm. My Mum reminds me I have swimming at 4.30 pm.I rush up stairs,get my swimming bag from my wardrobe.I rush downstairs and pick up my joining card.I jump into the car and my Mum drives me and my brother over to Holbrook Recreation Centre.Later I went to Woodcraft. Bed at 9.15pm.
